VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Validator can fail to receive commission reward in redeemAllRewards.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Limit the commisionRate to less than the value that causes issues

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Reward tokens could get lost due to rounding down.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Add a check to ensure that amount is a multiple of allocatedTokensPerEpoch in depositRewardTokens, takeOutRewardTokens, and setAllocatedTokensPerEpoch functions

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: unstake should update exchange rates first.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Separate the shares accounting from the activation of validator, simply removing the subtraction of global shares in disableValidator would allow them to claim those shares

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Usage of an incorrect version of Ownable library can potentially malfunction all onlyOwner functions.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Use @openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/access/OwnableUpgradeable.sol and @openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/utils/Initializable.sol instead of @openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol and change the initialize() function

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: unstake should update exchange rates first.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Move the updateGlobalExchangeRate() and updateValidator(v) calls to the beginning of the function
